title: (Fri Early) Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday: The Dark Origin of the OUIJA Board + Mailbag: How to Get Over Fear of Flying for Kids
itunes:title: (Fri Early) Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday: The Dark Origin of the OUIJA Board + Mailbag: How to Get Over Fear of Flying for Kids
description:
We play our weekly game of Easy Trivia and mix it up with Abby playing today! We all share fun facts including one about how the Ouija board named itself. Inside the mailbag, Bobby tries to help a mom whose daughter is deathly afraid of flying.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
